name: Join Example
query: SELECT e.name as İşçi, e.salary as Maaş, d.name as Şöbə, d.location as Yer FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.name WHERE e.salary > 3000

name: Multiple Join
query: SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.name as Məhsul, o.quantity, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.id ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC

name: Group By Having
query: SELECT department as Şöbə, COUNT(*) as İşçi_Sayı, AVG(salary) as Ortalama_Maaş, SUM(salary) as Ümumi_Maaş FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING AVG(salary) > 2500 ORDER BY Ortalama_Maaş DESC

name: Subquery
query: SELECT name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM employees) ORDER BY salary DESC

name: Nested Subquery
query: SELECT name, department, salary FROM employees WHERE salary = (SELECT MAX(salary) FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT')

name: Case When
query: SELECT name, salary, CASE WHEN salary < 2000 THEN 'Aşağı' WHEN salary BETWEEN 2000 AND 3500 THEN 'Orta' WHEN salary BETWEEN 3501 AND 5000 THEN 'Yüksək' ELSE 'Çox Yüksək' END as Maaş_Qrupu FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC

name: LEFT JOIN – İşçisi olmayan şöbələr
query: SELECT d.name AS Şöbə, COUNT(e.id) AS İşçi_Sayı FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employees e ON d.name = e.department GROUP BY d.name

name: RIGHT JOIN – Sifarişi olmayan müştərilər
query: SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.id AS Sifariş_ID FROM orders o RIGHT JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id WHERE o.id IS NULL

name: DISTINCT istifadə
query: SELECT DISTINCT department AS Unikal_Şöbələr FROM employees

name: Top 3 ən yüksək maaş
query: SELECT name, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 3

name: Between tarix aralığı
query: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31'

name: LIKE – Ad üzrə axtarış
query: SELECT name FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'A%'

name: IN operatoru
query: SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department IN ('IT', 'HR', 'Finance')

name: NOT IN istifadə
query: SELECT name FROM employees WHERE department NOT IN ('IT')

name: EXISTS subquery
query: SELECT name FROM departments d WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM employees e WHERE e.department = d.name)

name: COUNT + WHERE
query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS Aktiv_İşçilər FROM employees WHERE status = 'active'

name: SUM ilə gəlir hesabla
query: SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS Ümumi_Gəlir FROM orders

name: AVG maaş – şöbə üzrə
query: SELECT department, AVG(salary) AS Ortalama_Maaş FROM employees GROUP BY department

name: MAX maaş – hər şöbə
query: SELECT department, MAX(salary) AS Max_Maaş FROM employees GROUP BY department

name: ORDER BY + LIMIT
query: SELECT name, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary ASC LIMIT 5

name: UPDATE nümunəsi
query: UPDATE employees SET salary = salary * 1.10 WHERE department = 'IT'

name: DELETE şərtli
query: DELETE FROM employees WHERE status = 'inactive'

name: CREATE VIEW
query: CREATE VIEW high_salary_employees AS SELECT name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 4000

name: VIEW-dən oxuma
query: SELECT * FROM high_salary_employees

name: COALESCE istifadə
query: SELECT name, COALESCE(phone, 'Telefon yoxdur') AS Telefon FROM employees
